sentences.en: a piece of board will do the job.
sentences.cn: 用一块木板就可以了。

sentences.en: Consider what your likes and dislikes are about your job.
sentences.cn: 想想工作中哪些部分是自己喜欢的，哪些是不喜欢的。

sentences.en: Despite his lack of experience, he got the job.
sentences.cn: 他虽然经验不足，但还是获得了这份工作。

sentences.en: Do you enjoy your job?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢自己的工作吗？

sentences.en: He brought to the job not just considerable experience but passionate enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 他不仅给这一工作带来了不少经验，而且倾注了极大的热情。

sentences.en: He fought tooth and nail to keep his job.
sentences.cn: 他竭尽全力保住自己的工作。

sentences.en: He was fired from his job after roughing up a colleague.
sentences.cn: 他因为对一位同事动粗而被开除了。

sentences.en: He was hand-picked for this job by the Admiral.
sentences.cn: 他是由海军上将精心挑选出来担任这项工作的。

sentences.en: He’s been in the job for six years.
sentences.cn: 他干这份工作有六年了。

sentences.en: I got a fantastic new job and my salary tripled.
sentences.cn: 我得到了一份非常好的新工作，薪水涨到了原来的3倍。

sentences.en: I’m looking for a new job.
sentences.cn: 我在找一份新工作。

sentences.en: If you kept your nose clean, you had a job for life.
sentences.cn: 如果你规规矩矩，就可以一辈子都捧着这个饭碗。

sentences.en: it was a good job she hadn't brought the car.
sentences.cn: 她没买这辆汽车真运气。

sentences.en: It was the first paid job I ever had.
sentences.cn: 这是我第一份拿工资的工作。

sentences.en: It's very dispiriting for anyone to be out of a job.
sentences.cn: 每个人都会对事业很懊丧。

sentences.en: Laura landed a plum job with a smart art gallery.
sentences.cn: 劳拉在一家时尚画廊找到了份美差。

sentences.en: Sam does odd jobs(= small jobs in the house or garden ) for friends and neighbours.
sentences.cn: 萨姆为朋友和邻居打打零工。

sentences.en: The job losses will reduce the total workforce to 7,000.
sentences.cn: 职位减少后，在职工人总数将减至7,000人。

sentences.en: The job needs someone with a good track record in investment.
sentences.cn: 这项工作需要有良好投资业绩的人来担当。

sentences.en: The newspaper job had me doing the same thing day after day.
sentences.cn: 这份报社的工作让我日复一日地做着同样的事。

sentences.en: The public never had faith in his ability to handle the job.
sentences.cn: 公众从来不相信他有能力胜任这一职位。

sentences.en: Why not retrain for a job which will make you happier?
sentences.cn: 为什么不接受新的培训，找一份让你更快乐的工作？

sentences.en: Your pension can be affected if you change jobs.
sentences.cn: 换工作的话，会影响到你的退休金。

words.tran_cn: 失业的，无业的；（关于）失业者的
批发商；股票经纪人；临时工
公务人员；有固定工作者

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式，主英)好事，幸运的事，令人满意的状况
干某一工作；从事某一职业
(非正式)获得成功；实现（要求的结果)，完成

phrases.phrase: give something up as a bad job
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（认为将白费力气而）放弃
好运；幸运的事情；干的不错
就业市场；工作市场；求职广场
寻找工作；职位搜索；工作搜寻

phrases.phrase: make the best of a bad job

trans.tran_cn: 工作，任务，职责，犯罪行为，东西，（计算机）作业
trans.tran_en: the regular paid work that you do for an employer
the regular paid work that you do for an employer
